Package com.atakmap.android.contact

Class TadilJContactDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.database.android.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.atakmap.android.contact.TadilJContactDatabase
  • public class TadilJContactDatabase
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Database to maintain Tadil-J contact info. Allows for the connections to be persisted between ATAK instances.

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade​(DatabaseIface db,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
        Description copied from class: SQLiteOpenHelper
        Called when the database needs to be upgraded. The implementation should use this method to drop tables, add tables, or do anything else it needs to upgrade to the new schema version.

        The SQLite ALTER TABLE documentation can be found here. If you add new columns you can use ALTER TABLE to insert them into a live table. If you rename or remove columns you can use ALTER TABLE to rename the old table, then create the new table and then populate the new table with the contents of the old table.

        This method executes within a transaction. If an exception is thrown, all changes will automatically be rolled back.

        Specified by:
        onUpgrade in class SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - The database.
        oldVersion - The old database version.
        newVersion - The new database version.

      • onDowngrade

        public void onDowngrade​(DatabaseIface db,
                        int oldVersion,
                        int newVersion)
        Description copied from class: SQLiteOpenHelper
        Called when the database needs to be downgraded. This is strictly similar to SQLiteOpenHelper.onUpgrade(com.atakmap.database.DatabaseIface, int, int) method, but is called whenever current version is newer than requested one. However, this method is not abstract, so it is not mandatory for a customer to implement it. If not overridden, default implementation will reject downgrade and throws SQLiteException

        This method executes within a transaction. If an exception is thrown, all changes will automatically be rolled back.

        Overrides:
        onDowngrade in class SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - The database.
        oldVersion - The old database version.
        newVersion - The new database version.
